items.title: AirPods 4 在亚马逊降至 89 美元，创历史新低 (原标题: AirPods 4 Drop to $89 Record Low Price on Amazon)
items.creator: Mitchel Broussard
items.summary:
## AirPods 4 亚马逊降价至 89 美元，创历史新低

苹果 AirPods 4 基础款在本周末于亚马逊降价至 89.00 美元，低于原价 129.00 美元。这与我们追踪到的 AirPods 4 在亚马逊上的历史最低价持平，此价格适用于不带主动降噪 (ANC) 功能的基础型号。

![AirPods 4 新薄荷色](https://images.macrumors.com/t/ulewSu1TGroBGmNUPbAtKYq0Ty8=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/airpods-4-new-mint.jpeg?lossy)

### 优惠详情

*   **基础款 AirPods 4：** 售价 89.00 美元（原价 129.00 美元），创历史新低。
*   **带主动降噪 (ANC) 的 AirPods 4：** 售价 149.99 美元（原价 179.00 美元），但文章建议等待更大幅度的折扣，因为这并非历史最低价。
*   **配送信息：** 选择免费配送，AirPods 4 预计于 11 月 14 日送达；Prime 会员在部分地区可享受当日送达服务。
*   **联盟合作：** MacRumors 是亚马逊的联盟伙伴，通过链接购买可能会获得少量佣金。

### 其他 Apple 相关新闻与优惠

文章还提及了多项 Apple 相关的热门新闻和黑色星期五早期优惠：

*   **Apple 调整折抵换购价值：** 苹果更新了 iPhone、iPad、Mac 和 Apple Watch 等设备的折抵换购价值，多数设备的最大价值有所下降或保持不变，但 iPad Air 略有提升。
*   **Apple 分享 Liquid Glass 设计画廊：** 苹果正在推广 iOS 26 中的 Liquid Glass 设计，并展示了第三方开发者如何在其应用中采用这一美学。
*   **Apple 官网 AirTag 四件装价格异常：** 苹果美国在线商店突然以 29 美元的价格出售四件装 AirTag，与单个 AirTag 价格相同，这可能是一个定价错误，订单是否能履行尚不清楚，发货时间已推迟至 11 月下旬至 12 月初。
*   **iOS 26.1 发布：** 经过一个多月的测试，iOS 26.1 已于 11 月 3 日发布，包含 8 项新功能，其中包括调整 Liquid Glass 外观的选项。
*   **宜家推出 21 款 HomeKit 兼容智能家居产品：** 宜家宣布即将推出 21 款支持 Matter 协议的智能家居产品，包括传感器、灯具和控制器，这些产品将能与 HomeKit 和 Apple Home 应用兼容，且价格合理。
*   **黑色星期五早期 Apple 优惠：** 2025 年黑色星期五将于 11 月 28 日举行，文章汇总了 MacBook、Apple Watch、iPad 等热门 Apple 产品的早期优惠，主要集中在亚马逊。
*   **Apple Fitness+ 前景“正在审查中”：** 据 Bloomberg 报道，Apple Fitness+ 的未来“正在审查中”，该服务被认为是苹果“最弱的数字产品之一”，面临高流失率和低收入，但仍拥有一小部分忠实用户。
*   **iPhone 电池深度实验：** 一项为期六个月的电池测试比较了快充和慢充对 iPhone 12 电池寿命的影响。
*   **Apple 将在欧盟移除 iPhone-Apple Watch Wi-Fi 同步：** 为遵守欧盟法规，苹果将在 iOS 26.2 中禁用 iPhone 和 Apple Watch 之间自动 Wi-Fi 网络同步功能。
items.shortSummary: 苹果 AirPods 4 基础款在亚马逊降至 89 美元，创历史新低，而带主动降噪功能的型号售价 149.99 美元。文章还涵盖了其他 Apple 相关新闻，包括 Apple 产品折抵价值调整、iOS 26.1 发布、AirTag 四件装的潜在定价错误、宜家 HomeKit 兼容产品、Apple Fitness+ 前景审查以及 iPhone 电池测试等，并提及了黑色星期五的早期优惠。
items.translated_title: AirPods 4 在亚马逊降至 89 美元，创历史新低
items.content:
Apple's AirPods 4 have dropped to $89.00 on Amazon this weekend, down from $129.00. This is a match of the lowest price we've ever tracked on the AirPods 4 on Amazon, and it's for the base model without Active Noise Cancellation.

Note: MacRumors is an affiliate partner with Amazon. When you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment, which helps us keep the site running.

Free delivery options place the AirPods 4 at a November 14 delivery date, but Prime members should see same-day delivery dates in some locations. You can also get the AirPods 4 with ANC on sale for $149.99, down from $179.00, but we recommend waiting for a steeper discount on this model considering this isn't an all-time low price.

$40 OFF
AirPods 4 for $89.00


You can find all the Apple Black Friday Deals currently available in our dedicated post. For everything else, we're keeping track of all of the season's best Apple-related deals in our Black Friday roundup, so be sure to check back throughout the month for an updated list of all the most notable discounts you'll find for Black Friday 2025.



Deals Newsletter


Interested in hearing more about the best deals you can find as we head into the holidays? Sign up for our Deals Newsletter and we'll keep you updated so you don't miss the biggest deals of the season!




Related Roundup: Apple Deals

items.title: 今天是你购买Nomad独家八五折优惠的最后机会 (原标题: Today's Your Last Chance to Shop Our Exclusive 15% Off Sale at Nomad)
items.creator: Mitchel Broussard
items.summary:
## Nomad独家八五折优惠活动即将结束

MacRumors与Nomad合作，为读者提供了一个独家机会，通过使用优惠码**MR2025**在结账时享受额外八五折优惠。此优惠适用于Nomad的库存商品，包括iPhone 17手机壳、Apple Watch表带和MagSafe兼容产品等。

### 优惠详情
*   **优惠码**：**MR2025**
*   **适用范围**：Nomad的库存商品，如iPhone 17手机壳、Apple Watch表带、MagSafe兼容产品。
*   **排除项**：此独家折扣不适用于已在促销中的商品、近期发布的新产品以及第三方品牌产品。
*   **截止日期**：此促销活动将于今晚结束，感兴趣的顾客需尽快购买。
*   **使用方法**：将商品添加到购物车，在支付步骤输入优惠码**MR2025**即可看到折扣。

### 精选折扣商品示例（使用优惠码MR2025）
*   **iPhone 17手机壳**：
    *   Modern Case和Rugged Case：从$49.00降至**$41.00**。
    *   Modern Leather Case：从$75.00降至**$63.00**。
*   **Apple Watch表带**：
    *   Apple Watch Ultra Rocky Point Band：从$79.00降至**$67.00**。
    *   Apple Watch Ultra Titanium Band：从$199.00降至**$169.00**。
    *   Sport Band：从$69.00降至**$58.00**。

### Nomad清仓促销
除了上述独家折扣外，Nomad目前还在进行清仓促销，对旧款产品如iPhone 16手机壳、AirPods手机壳、Apple Watch表带和无线充电器等提供大幅折扣。请注意，MacRumors的独家优惠码**MR2025**不能与这些清仓折扣叠加使用，但清仓区仍有许多值得关注的优惠。

### 联盟伙伴声明
MacRumors是Nomad的联盟伙伴。当您点击链接并进行购买时，MacRumors可能会收到一笔小额佣金，这有助于网站的运营。

![2021 Exclusive Apple Accessories Deals Nomad](https://images.macrumors.com/t/6yFdUrJgAyIkj3ig5OZeZotkjyQ=/400x0/article-new/2021/12/2021-Exclusive-Apple-Accessories-Deals-Nomad.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: Nomad的独家八五折优惠活动（使用代码MR2025）将于今晚结束。此优惠适用于iPhone 17手机壳、Apple Watch表带和MagSafe兼容产品等库存商品，但不包括已打折或新品。此外，Nomad还有单独的清仓促销。MacRumors作为联盟伙伴，通过购买可能获得佣金。
items.translated_title: 今天是你购买Nomad独家八五折优惠的最后机会
items.content:
We've partnered with Nomad this week to get you an extra 15 percent off in stock gear with the code MR2025 at checkout, allowing our readers a chance to save on iPhone 17 cases, Apple Watch bands, MagSafe-compatible products, and more. Additionally, Nomad is currently running an overstock sale with discounts across various accessories like AirPods cases, iPhone 16 cases, Apple Watch bands, and Lightning cables.

Note: MacRumors is an affiliate partner with Nomad. When you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment, which helps us keep the site running.

To see the discount on your order, all you have to do is add an accessory to your cart, proceed to checkout, then enter the promo code MR2025 on the payment step and you'll get an extra 15 percent off your cart. Our code excludes items that are already on sale, recently launched products, and 3rd party gear. This sale ends later tonight, so be sure to shop soon if you're interested.

Note: Use code MR2025 to see the discount.

15% OFF
Nomad Exclusive Sale


Our exclusive discount knocks the price of Nomad's Modern Case for iPhone 17 and Rugged Case down to $41.00, from $49.00. You can also get the Modern Leather Case for iPhone 17 for $63.00 with our code, down from $75.00.

If you're shopping for Apple Watch Bands, Nomad's Rocky Point Band for Apple Watch Ultra is on sale for $67.00, down from $79.00. The Titanium Band for Apple Watch Ultra is down to $169.00, from $199.00, while the athletic Sport Band is down to $58.00, from $69.00.

In addition to these discounts on newer products, Nomad's overstock sale has big markdowns on older gear like iPhone 16 cases, Apple Watch Bands, wireless chargers, and more. Our exclusive code does not stack with these discounts, but there are still many steep discounts in this sale that are worth taking a look at before it ends.

You can find all the Apple Black Friday Deals currently available in our dedicated post. For everything else, we're keeping track of all of the season's best Apple-related deals in our Black Friday roundup, so be sure to check back throughout the month for an updated list of all the most notable discounts you'll find for Black Friday 2025.



Deals Newsletter


Interested in hearing more about the best deals you can find as we head into the holidays? Sign up for our Deals Newsletter and we'll keep you updated so you don't miss the biggest deals of the season!

items.title: 苹果正在为iPhone开发这5项新的卫星功能 (原标题: Apple Developing These 5 New Satellite Features for iPhone)
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
# 苹果正在为iPhone开发这5项新的卫星功能

据彭博社的Mark Gurman报道，苹果公司正在为iPhone开发一系列新的卫星连接功能。

![iPhone Satellite Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/FnKDsyZf0d7Ax0RgKnOtM7vGnpY=/400x0/article-new/2024/11/iPhone-Satellite-Feature.jpg?lossy)

Gurman在本周的“Power On”通讯中透露，正在开发中的新功能包括：

*   **Apple 地图通过卫星：** 无需蜂窝或Wi-Fi连接即可在Apple 地图中进行导航。
*   **信息应用中的照片通过卫星：** 支持使用卫星连接在信息应用中发送照片。
*   **自然使用：** 在室内环境中使用卫星连接，无需将设备物理性地指向晴朗的天空。
*   **5G卫星（5G NTN）：** 支持5G NTN，允许蜂窝塔利用卫星来增加覆盖范围。
*   **第三方应用的卫星API框架：** 一个API，将允许开发者自愿将卫星连接集成到他们的应用中。并非所有功能和服务都将兼容。

目前，苹果似乎没有计划通过卫星实现电话、视频通话或网页浏览。

**定价与未来计划**

目前，苹果的卫星连接功能是免费提供的。据报道，未来对于更高级的功能，苹果计划让客户直接向卫星运营商付费。苹果也可能与SpaceX等公司合作，为扩展连接创建一个付费选项。Gurman补充说，公司内部曾讨论过提供自己的卫星服务，但由于担心苹果不应扮演运营商的角色，这一可能性被搁置。

**基础设施升级**

许多正在开发中的新卫星功能显然需要对Globalstar的基础设施进行升级，而苹果曾帮助Globalstar提供资金。Gurman表示，如果SpaceX收购Globalstar，必要的增强功能可能会更快地推出。

![MacRumors x Bloomberg Banner Warm](https://images.macrumors.com/t/6Ve8995RzEQOT6s7CMze_yE9iJY=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/MacRumors-x-Bloomberg-Banner-Warm.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 苹果正为iPhone开发五项新的卫星功能，包括卫星地图导航、信息应用发送照片、室内卫星连接、5G卫星覆盖及第三方应用API。目前不计划支持通话和网页浏览。未来高级功能可能收费，并需升级Globalstar基础设施。苹果曾讨论提供自己的卫星服务，但因不愿扮演运营商角色而搁置。这些进展由彭博社的Mark Gurman披露。
items.translated_title: 苹果正在为iPhone开发这5项新的卫星功能
items.content:
Apple is working on a series of new satellite connectivity features for the iPhone, Bloomberg's Mark Gurman reports.


In this week's "Power On" newsletter, Gurman revealed that the new features in development include:


  • Apple Maps via satellite: Navigation in Apple Maps without cellular or Wi-Fi connectivity.

  • Photos in Messages via satellite: Support for sending photos in the Messages app using satellite connectivity.

  • Natural Usage: Satellite connectivity from indoors environments, without the need to physically point the device toward clear sky.

  • Satellite over 5G: Support for 5G NTN, allowing cell towers to use satellites for increased coverage.

  • Satellite API framework for third-party apps: An API that will allow developers to voluntarily integrate satellite connectivity into their apps. Not all features and services will be compatible.


There apparently no plans to enable phone calls, video calls, or web browsing via satellite at present.

Today, Apple's satellite connectivity features are available for free. For more advanced capabilities in the future, Apple reportedly plans to let customers pay satellite carriers for features directly.

Apple could also create a paid option for extended connectivity with a company like SpaceX. Gurman added that there have been discussions in the company about offering its own satellite service, but concerns that Apple shouldn't act like a carrier have stifled that possibility.

Many of the new satellite features in development will apparently require upgrades to Globalstar's infrastructure, which Apple helped to finance. Gurman said that if SpaceX acquires Globalstar, the necessary enhancements could roll out faster.

Tags: Bloomberg, iPhone Satellite Features, Mark Gurman

This article, "Apple Developing These 5 New Satellite Features for iPhone" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: Apple Fitness+ 的未来‘正在审查中’ (原标题: Future of Apple Fitness+ 'Under Review')
items.creator: Hartley Charlton
items.summary:
## Apple Fitness+ 的未来正在审查中

根据彭博社马克·古尔曼（Mark Gurman）的报道，Apple Fitness+ 服务正在进行重组，其未来“正在审查中”。该服务被认为是苹果公司“最弱的数字产品之一”，面临着高用户流失率和低收入的问题。

### 服务现状与挑战

*   **表现不佳**：Apple Fitness+ 被古尔曼指出是苹果数字产品中表现较差的服务，用户流失率高且收入贡献小。
*   **忠实用户群**：尽管如此，该服务拥有一小部分忠实用户，这使得苹果难以在不引发强烈反弹的情况下将其关闭。
*   **运营成本**：服务的运营成本相对较低，因此关闭它所节省的开支不足以抵消可能带来的负面新闻影响。

![Apple fitness plus feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/MUOeeus8aj8XX8GYtlL2mmcI-mA=/400x0/article-new/2020/11/Apple-fitness-plus-feature.jpg?lossy)

### 管理层重组

*   **新领导层**：Apple Fitness+ 将迎来新的管理层，由苹果健康副总裁桑布尔·德赛（Sumbul Desai）接管该服务。
*   **汇报关系**：健康部门（现已包含 Apple Fitness+）将直接向服务主管艾迪·库（Eddy Cue）汇报。
*   **目标**：此次重组预计将增加改善服务业绩的压力。

### 服务概览

*   **推出时间**：Apple Fitness+ 于2020年推出。
*   **服务类型**：它是一个无广告的按需视频指导健身流媒体服务。
*   **订阅费用**：月费为9.99美元，也可作为 Apple One Premier 套餐的一部分提供。

![MacRumors x Bloomberg Banner Warm](https://images.macrumors.com/t/6Ve8995RzEQOT6s7CMze_yE9iJY=/400x0/article-new/2025/06/MacRumors-x-Bloomberg-Banner-Warm.jpg?lossy)
items.shortSummary: 据彭博社报道，Apple Fitness+ 服务因用户流失率高、收入低而被“审查”，并被认为是苹果“最弱的数字产品之一”。尽管拥有忠实用户群且运营成本低廉，苹果仍对其进行重组。苹果健康副总裁桑布尔·德赛将接管该服务，并直接向服务主管艾迪·库汇报，旨在改善业绩。该服务于2020年推出，月费9.99美元。
items.translated_title: Apple Fitness+ 的未来‘正在审查中’
items.content:
The future of Apple Fitness+ is "under review" amid a reorganization of the service, according to Bloomberg's Mark Gurman.


In the latest edition of his "Power On" newsletter, Gurman said that Apple Fitness+ remains one of the company's "weakest digital offerings." The service apparently suffers from high churn and little revenue.

Nevertheless, Fitness+ has a small, loyal fanbase that makes it difficult for Apple to shut it down "without a backlash." The service is sufficiently inexpensive to operate that negative headlines would not be worth the saving.

Nevertheless, Gurman says the "future of Fitness+ is under review." He revealed that the service is to receive new management, with Apple health vice president Sumbul Desai taking control of the service. The health division, now including Apple Fitness+, will report directly to services chief Eddy Cue. The reorganization is likely to lead to added pressure to improve results.

Apple Fitness+ launched in 2020 as an ad-free video on demand guided workout streaming service. It costs $9.99 per month and is available as part of the Apple One Premier bundle.

Tags: Apple Fitness Plus, Bloomberg, Mark Gurman

This article, "Future of Apple Fitness+ 'Under Review'" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums

items.title: MacBook、Apple Watch、iPad等产品的最佳黑色星期五早期苹果优惠 (原标题: The Best Early Black Friday Apple Deals on MacBook, Apple Watch, iPad, and More)
items.creator: Mitchel Broussard
items.summary:
本文介绍了2025年黑色星期五（11月28日）前夕，苹果产品在亚马逊等平台上的早期优惠，重点关注历史最低价或接近历史最低价的折扣。

## 主要亮点

*   **优惠时间**：黑色星期五临近，文章分享了当前可用的最佳早期优惠。
*   **主要销售平台**：大部分折扣可在亚马逊上找到，部分MacBook Pro优惠在Expercom。
*   **价格策略**：所有列出的产品均达到历史最低价或非常接近历史最低价。
*   **联盟伙伴声明**：MacRumors是部分供应商的联盟伙伴，通过链接购买可能获得佣金。

## 精选推荐

以下是文章中列出的部分顶级优惠：

*   **AirTag四件装**：$64.99（优惠$34）
*   **Apple Watch SE 3**：$199.99（优惠$50）
*   **Apple Watch Ultra 3**：$699.99（优惠$99）
*   **13英寸MacBook Air**：$749.99（优惠$249）
*   **14英寸M5 MacBook Pro**：$1,487.07（优惠$113）

![图片 1](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/10/Early-Black-Friday-Deals-1.jpg)

## 详细优惠信息

### M5 MacBook Pro

*   **独家折扣**：Expercom提供高达$234的折扣，这是M5 MacBook Pro迄今为止的最低价。
*   **配置示例**：
    *   512GB 14英寸M5 MacBook Pro：$1,487.07（原价$1,599.00）
    *   10核M5, 16GB RAM, 512GB：$1,487.07（原价$1,599.00）
    *   10核M5, 16GB RAM, 1TB：$1,673.07（原价$1,799.00）
    *   还提供高达32GB RAM、4TB存储和Nano-Texture显示屏的定制配置。
*   **购买提示**：在Safari浏览器中点击链接可能无法显示折扣价，建议在新标签页打开或使用Chrome、Firefox等浏览器。

![图片 2](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/m5-macbook-pro-holiday-green.jpeg)

### Apple Watch

*   **Series 11**：46毫米天然钛金属型号$711.00（优惠$88）。
*   **Ultra 3**：部分型号优惠$99，如黑色钛金属（海洋表带）$699.99。
*   **SE 3**：首次大幅折扣，40毫米GPS型号$199.99（优惠$49）。
*   **SE 2**：历史最低价，40毫米GPS型号$159.99（优惠$89）。
*   **Series 10**：部分型号优惠$119，如42毫米GPS型号$279.99。

![图片 3](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/apple-watch-se-3-new-green.jpeg)

### iPad (第11代)

*   亚马逊提供Wi-Fi型号$50折扣。
*   128GB Wi-Fi iPad：$299.00（原价$349.00）。
*   256GB Wi-Fi iPad：$399.00；512GB Wi-Fi iPad：$599.00。

![图片 4](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/ipad-holiday-green.jpeg)

### iPad mini (第7代)

*   Wi-Fi型号价格低廉，128GB Wi-Fi型号$399.00（优惠$100）。
*   蜂窝网络型号也有优惠。

![图片 5](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/ipad-mini-green-holiday.jpeg)

### M5 iPad Pro

*   亚马逊首次提供显著折扣。
*   11英寸M5 iPad Pro (256GB Wi-Fi)：$943.00（优惠$57）。
*   13英寸M5 iPad Pro (256GB Wi-Fi)：$1,246.00（优惠$54）；13英寸M5 iPad Pro (2TB Wi-Fi Nano-Texture)：$2,298.00（优惠$101）。

![图片 6](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/m5-ipad-pro-holiday-green.jpeg)

### M4 MacBook Air

*   13英寸M4 MacBook Air (256GB)：$749.99（优惠$249），创历史新低。
*   13英寸和15英寸M4 MacBook Air的512GB型号也有优惠。

![图片 7](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/m4-macbook-air-green-.jpeg)

### Apple Pencil

*   Apple Pencil Pro：$99.00（优惠$30）。

![图片 8](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/apple-pencil-pro-green.jpeg)

### AirTag

*   四件装：$64.99（优惠$34），与历史最低价持平。
*   单件装：$24.00，未达到历史最低价，建议考虑四件装或等待。

![图片 9](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/airtag-green-holiday.jpeg)

### iPhone 17 保护壳

*   亚马逊对iPhone 17和iPhone Air系列的透明、硅胶和TechWoven保护壳提供大幅折扣。
*   例如，iPhone 17透明保护壳$39.99（原价$49.00）。

![图片 10](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/iphone-17-case-holiday.jpeg)

### Mac Mini

*   M4 Mac mini (256GB)：$499.00（优惠$100）。
*   M4 Mac mini (512GB)：$689.99（优惠$109）。

![图片 11](https://images.macrumors.com/article-new/2025/11/m4-mac-mini-holiday.jpeg)

## 总结

文章鼓励读者关注MacRumors的黑色星期五汇总，以获取最新的苹果产品折扣信息。
items.shortSummary: 随着2025年黑色星期五临近，本文介绍了苹果产品在亚马逊等平台上的早期优惠。主要折扣涵盖MacBook、Apple Watch、iPad、AirTag和iPhone 17保护壳等，许多商品达到历史最低价或接近历史最低价。例如，13英寸M4 MacBook Air降至$749.99，Apple Watch SE 2低至$159.99，AirTag四件装$64.99。M5 MacBook Pro和M5 iPad Pro也首次出现显著折扣，为消费者提供了提前购买苹果产品的绝佳机会。
items.translated_title: MacBook、Apple Watch、iPad等产品的最佳黑色星期五早期苹果优惠
items.content:
We're officially in the month of Black Friday, which will take place on Friday, November 28 in 2025. As always, this will be the best time of the year to shop for great deals, including popular Apple products like AirPods, iPad, Apple Watch, and more. In this article, the majority of the discounts will be found on Amazon.

Note: MacRumors is an affiliate partner with some of these vendors. When you click a link and make a purchase, we may receive a small payment, which helps us keep the site running.

Specifically, we're sharing all of the Apple products that currently have all-time low prices, or discounts that are at least very close to their record-low prices. Of course, these are early Black Friday deals, so even better discounts could emerge later in the month, but if you're shopping right now these are all the best prices around.

Our Top Picks


  • AirTag 4-Pack for $64.99 ($34 off)

  • Apple Watch SE 3 for $199.99 ($50 off)

  • Apple Watch Ultra 3 for $699.99 ($99 off)

  • 13-Inch MacBook Air for $749.99 ($249 off)

  • 14-Inch M5 MacBook Pro for $1,487.07 ($113 off)

Best Early Black Friday Deals


  • The Best Early Black Friday AirTag Deals

  • The Best Early Black Friday Apple Watch Deals

  • Get Your Holiday Shopping Started With Our Exclusive 15% Off Sale at Nomad

  • Best Buy Reveals Black Friday Plans With Sitewide Sales Available Now

  • Target Kicks Off Early Black Friday Sale With Sitewide Savings on Apple Accessories and More

  • Samsung's Early Black Friday Sale Features Big Savings on Monitors, TVs, Appliances, and More

M5 MacBook Pro




Note: We're currently seeing an issue where clicking on the links in this article may not show the discounted pricing. Opening the links in a new tab/window or manually copying and pasting them into your browser should, however, work. The issue seems to only affect Safari, with Chrome, Firefox, and several other browsers working fine in our testing.

MacRumors readers can save on Apple's brand new 14-inch M5 MacBook Pro at Expercom right now. Discounts reach up to $234 off original prices, and across the board these are the lowest prices we've tracked to date on the M5 MacBook Pro.

These discounts have been automatically applied on Expercom's website when visited through the links below. Discounts include the 512GB 14-inch M5 MacBook Pro for $1,487.07, down from $1,599.00, plus a few models with increased RAM.

UP TO $234 OFF
M5 MacBook Pro Exclusive Discounts


Our exclusive discount is available in both Space Black and Silver color options for each computer. We've listed a few of the base models of the M5 MacBook Pro below, but Expercom is offering a wide range of custom configurations on sale as well. This includes models with as much as 32GB RAM, up to 4TB of storage, and Nano-Texture display options as well.

  • 10-Core M5, 16GB RAM, 512GB - $1,487.07, down from $1,599.00

  • 10-Core M5, 16GB RAM, 1TB - $1,673.07, down from $1,799.00

  • 10-Core M5, 24GB RAM, 512GB - $1,812.57, down from $1,949.00

  • 10-Core M5, 24GB RAM, 1TB - $1,859.07, down from $1,999.00


AirPods




The best early Black Friday AirPods discount is on the AirPods 4, available for $89.99 right now on Amazon, down from $129.00. This is a match of the best price we've ever seen on this model on Amazon.

$39 OFF
AirPods 4 for $89.99

Apple Watch



Series 11


There aren't many big discounts on the GPS models of the Apple Watch Series 11 yet, but we are tracking a notable markdown on one of the high-end Titanium devices this weekend.

$88 OFF
46mm Natural Titanium for $711.00

Ultra 3


One of the best all-around early Black Friday discounts is on the Apple Watch Ultra 3 at $99 off select models.

$99 OFF
Black Titanium (Ocean Band) for $699.99

$99 OFF
Black Titanium (Milanese Loop) for $799.99

SE 3


The Apple Watch SE 3 received its first major discount on Amazon this week, with $49 off the 44mm GPS model.

$49 OFF
40mm GPS for $199.99

$49 OFF
44mm GPS for $229.99

SE 2


Prices start at just $159.99 for the 40mm GPS Apple Watch SE, then increase to $189.99 for the 44mm GPS model. Both of these are $89 discounts on the wearables, and all-time low prices on each device. You can find Midnight, Silver, and Starlight case color options at these prices for both sizes.

$89 OFF
40mm GPS for $159.99

$89 OFF
44mm GPS for $189.99

Series 10



Amazon also has a few discounts on the Apple Watch Series 10, with $119 off these models. You can get the 42mm GPS Apple Watch Series 10 for $279.99, down from $399.00, and the 46mm GPS model for $309.99, down from $429.00. The 42mm GPS model is only available in Jet Black Aluminum, but the 46mm GPS model has Jet Black, Rose Gold, and Silver Aluminum options available at this low price.

$119 OFF
42mm GPS for $279.99

$119 OFF
46mm GPS for $309.99

iPad




Amazon this week is taking $50 off Wi-Fi models of Apple's 11th generation iPad. Prices start at $299.00 for the 128GB Wi-Fi iPad, down from $349.00, a second-best price on this model.

$50 OFF
128GB Wi-Fi iPad for $299.00

$50 OFF
256GB Wi-Fi iPad for $399.00

$50 OFF
512GB Wi-Fi iPad for $599.00


Additionally, Amazon has the 256GB Wi-Fi iPad for $399.00 ($50 off) and the 512GB Wi-Fi iPad for $599.00 ($50 off).

iPad mini



Amazon this week has low prices on nearly every Wi-Fi model of the iPad mini 7, starting at $399.00 for the 128GB Wi-Fi tablet, down from $499.00. You'll also find a few deals on cellular models during this sale.

$100 OFF
128GB Wi-Fi iPad mini 7 for $399.00

$100 OFF
256GB Wi-Fi iPad mini 7 for $499.00

$100 OFF
512GB Wi-Fi iPad mini 7 for $699.00


M5 iPad Pro




Amazon has the first notable discounts on Apple's brand new M5 iPad Pro, with the entry-level 11-inch model available for $943.00, down from $999.00.

$57 OFF
11-inch M5 iPad Pro (256GB Wi-Fi) for $943.00

$54 OFF
13-inch M5 iPad Pro (256GB Wi-Fi) for $1,246.00

$101 OFF
13-inch M5 iPad Pro (2TB Wi-Fi Nano-Texture) for $2,298.00


In terms of the 11-inch M5 iPad Pro, this is still one of the only steeper discounts, with others sitting around $25 off. If you're shopping for the 13-inch M5 iPad Pro, you'll find the 256GB Wi-Fi model for $1,246.00 ($54 off), the 512GB Wi-Fi model for $1,440.00 ($50 off), and the 2TB Wi-Fi Nano-Texture Glass model for $2,298.00 ($101 off).

M4 MacBook Air




You can get the 13-inch M4 MacBook Air (256GB) for $749.99, down from $999.00, a new all-time low price on the computer that beats the previous low by about $50. You'll also find many of the 512GB models of the 13-inch and 15-inch M4 MacBook Air on sale this week.

$249 OFF
13-inch M4 MacBook Air (256GB) for $749.99

$249 OFF
15-inch M4 MacBook Air (256GB) for $949.99

Apple Pencil




You can get the Apple Pencil Pro available for $99.00, down from $129.00.

$30 OFF
Apple Pencil Pro for $99.00


We're keeping track of all of the season's best Apple-related deals in our Black Friday roundup, so be sure to check back throughout the month for an updated list of all the most notable discounts you'll find for Black Friday 2025.

AirTag




Amazon has Apple's AirTag 4-Pack for $64.99, down from $99.00. This is a match of the all-time low price on the accessory.

$34 OFF
AirTag 4-Pack for $64.99


If you're shopping for just one AirTag, Amazon has the AirTag 1-Pack for $24.00, which doesn't match the all-time low of $19.99 that we've seen recently, so you might want to hold off for now or consider stepping up to the 4-Pack deal.

iPhone 17 Cases




Amazon this week brought back big discounts across Apple's Clear, Silicone, and TechWoven Cases for the iPhone 17 and iPhone Air lineup. Items on sale include Clear, Silicone, and TechWoven Cases for the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and iPhone Air. We're also tracking a few discounts on other accessories like the FineWoven Wallet with MagSafe.

UP TO 26% OFF
iPhone 17 Cases at Amazon

iPhone Air


  • Clear Case - $39.99, down from $49.00

iPhone 17


  • Clear Case - $39.99, down from $49.00

  • Silicone Case - $37.00, down from $49.00

iPhone 17 Pro


  • Clear Case - $37.99, down from $49.00

  • Silicone Case - $37.99, down from $49.00

  • TechWoven Case - $49.99, down from $59.00

iPhone 17 Pro Max


  • Clear Case - $39.99, down from $49.00

  • Silicone Case - $37.99, down from $49.00

  • TechWoven Case - $49.99, down from $59.00


Mac Mini




Amazon is taking $100 off the 256GB model of the M4 Mac mini in early Black Friday deals, as well as over $100 off 512GB models.

$100 OFF
M4 Mac Mini (256GB) for $499.00

$109 OFF
M4 Mac Mini (512GB) for $689.99




Deals Newsletter


Interested in hearing more about the best deals you can find as we head into the holidays? Sign up for our Deals Newsletter and we'll keep you updated so you don't miss the biggest deals of the season!




Related Roundups: Apple Black Friday, Apple Deals

items.title: 头条新闻：iOS 26.1 发布，iOS 26.2 Beta，iPhone 18 传闻等 (原标题: Top Stories: iOS 26.1 Released, iOS 26.2 Beta, iPhone 18 Rumors, and More)
items.creator: MacRumors Staff
items.summary:
本周，苹果在软件和硬件方面均有重要动态，包括 iOS 26.1 的公开发布、iOS 26.2 Beta 的启动以及对未来产品线的展望。

## 本周苹果动态概览

*   **软件方面**：iOS 26.1 正式发布，紧随其后的是 iOS 26.2 的测试版，预示着更多功能更新。
*   **硬件方面**：2026年有望成为苹果的重要一年，预计将有几乎所有产品线的更新以及一些新产品推出。

![top stories 2025 11 08](https://images.macrumors.com/t/TOhLQYJT_Ljb19lZXZ_2tdG6nKk=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/top-stories-2025-11-08.jpg?lossy)

## iOS 26.1 新功能

在 iOS 26、macOS Tahoe 等主要操作系统发布约六周后，苹果推出了首个重要后续更新 iOS 26.1，主要新功能包括：

*   新增 Liquid Glass 透明度调节开关。
*   新增选项可关闭锁屏滑动访问相机的手势。
*   闹钟和计时器在锁屏上新增“滑动停止”按钮，以减少意外关闭。
*   新增 Apple Intelligence 语言支持。

![iOS 26](https://images.macrumors.com/t/kNmJGc1WKHpbB_a28crv3zDlfQI=/400x0/article-new/2025/09/iOS-26.1-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## iOS 26.2 Beta 1 新功能

iOS 26.1 发布后，苹果几乎立即推出了 iOS 26.2 的首个开发者测试版，预计将于12月发布正式版。目前已发现的改动包括：

*   锁屏时钟的 Liquid Glass 滑块。
*   睡眠评分功能更新。
*   为提醒事项设置闹钟的功能。
*   **针对欧盟用户**：更新后 AirPods 将支持实时翻译，但会失去 iPhone 和 Apple Watch 之间的自动 Wi-Fi 网络同步功能。

![ios 26 2 whats new](https://images.macrumors.com/t/VuJIxfg7pkth6v1WmNXqUmTuNic=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/ios-26-2-whats-new.jpg?lossy)

## 2026年苹果新产品展望

据彭博社 Mark Gurman 报告，苹果计划在2026年发布至少15款新产品，可能包括对智能家居平台的重大改造。Apple TV 和 HomePod mini 可能在2025年底前获得更新，但新的 Mac 产品预计要等到2026年。

![Apple Logo Spotlight](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-ExMtbhwKwtSkj33nseqBNpPVP0=/400x0/article-new/2023/09/Apple-Logo-Spotlight.jpg?lossy)

## iPhone 18 Pro 潜在新颜色

有爆料者称，iPhone 18 Pro 机型可能推出一种新的浓郁暖色调。微博用户“Instant Digital”透露，潜在颜色选项包括咖啡色、紫色或勃艮第色。苹果目前仍在决策阶段，最终只会选择其中一种进行生产。

![Coffee Burgundy and Purple iPhone 18 Pro Mock](https://images.macrumors.com/t/TdSd_I5TEQXGK2ndQhHj1KAAoHA=/400x0/article-new/2025/11/Coffee-Burgundy-and-Purple-iPhone-18-Pro-Mock.jpg?lossy)

## 新版 Siri 将集成 Google Gemini

据报道，预计明年3月或4月推出的更强大版 Siri 将利用定制版 Google Gemini。苹果每年将向 Google 支付约10亿美元，以获取一个1.2万亿参数的 AI 模型来驱动 Siri，以提升其 AI 能力。

![Apple Intelligence General Feature](https://images.macrumors.com/t/-d_V1_ldUVFarK7gecXm6-oH_Ak=/400x0/article-new/2024/06/Apple-Intelligence-General-Feature.jpg?lossy)

## 黑色星期五早期苹果优惠

11月已至，假日购物季和黑色星期五促销活动即将开始。MacRumors 正在关注最佳早期苹果产品优惠，百思买、塔吉特和三星等零售商已公布早期销售计划。

![Early Black Friday Deals 2](https://images.macrumors.com/t/FqauIXds6McnYOcW0stIi3DWNFM=/400x0/article-new/2025/10/Early-Black-Friday-Deals-2.jpg?lossy)

## 其他热门新闻

*   **苹果调整折抵换购价值**：iPhone、iPad、Mac 等设备的最高折抵价值多数下降或不变，但 iPad Air 略有上涨。
*   **苹果分享 Liquid Glass 设计画廊**：推广 iOS 26 中的 Liquid Glass 设计，展示第三方开发者如何应用该美学。
*   **AirTag 四件装惊人低价**：苹果美国官网曾以单个 AirTag 的价格（29美元）出售四件装，可能为定价错误。
*   **宜家推出21款 HomeKit 兼容智能家居产品**：包括传感器、灯具和控制选项，均支持 Matter 协议。
*   **苹果电视新片头采用实景特效**：新的 Apple TV 片头序列通过拍摄大型玻璃版 Apple TV 标志，结合物理运动和灯光变化制作而成。
items.shortSummary: 本周苹果发布了 iOS 26.1，新增 Liquid Glass 调整、相机手势关闭等功能，并迅速推出 iOS 26.2 Beta。2026年，苹果预计将发布至少15款新产品，包括智能家居平台更新。iPhone 18 Pro 传闻将有新颜色，而新版 Siri 将整合 Google Gemini。此外，苹果调整了设备折抵价值，并启动了黑色星期五早期优惠。欧盟地区 iOS 26.2 将移除 iPhone-Apple Watch Wi-Fi 同步功能。
items.translated_title: 头条新闻：iOS 26.1 发布，iOS 26.2 Beta，iPhone 18 传闻等

images.alt: Coffee Burgundy and Purple iPhone 18 Pro Mock

items.content:
Things were busy in Apple software land this week, with the public release of iOS 26.1 and updates for Apple's other platforms being quickly followed by the round of 26.2 betas with plenty more changes in store.


On the hardware side, we're still wondering whether we'll see anything more released before the end of the year, but either way, 2026 is shaping up to be a big year for Apple with updates across almost the entire lineup and likely some new entrants as well.

Top Stories


Everything New in iOS 26.1


Some six weeks after the initial release of iOS 26, macOS Tahoe, and other major operating system updates, Apple this week released the first significant follow-on updates with the 26.1 versions.


iOS 26.1 adds a new toggle to adjust the transparency of Liquid Glass, an option to turn off the Lock Screen swipe gesture to access the Camera, a new "slide to stop" button on the Lock Screen for alarms and timers to reduce accidental dismissals, new Apple Intelligence language support, and more.

Everything New in iOS 26.2 Beta 1


As is frequently the case, the public release of iOS 26.1 was almost immediately followed by the first developer beta of iOS 26.2 as Apple begins testing the next update ahead of an expected December release.


Changes discovered in the first beta so far include a Liquid Glass slider for the Lock Screen clock, updates to the Sleep Score feature, the ability to set alarms for reminders, and more. EU users will get access to Live Translation on AirPods with the update, though they will lose automatic Wi-Fi network syncing between iPhone and Apple Watch.

Report: Apple to Launch These New Products in 2026


Apple is gearing up to release at least 15 new products in 2026, according to a new recap from Bloomberg's Mark Gurman, and it is likely to include a long-awaited revamp of the company's smart home platform.


It's possible we could even get a few more updates to products like the Apple TV and HomePod mini before the end of 2025, but if you're waiting for additional new Macs, you're almost certainly going to need to wait until next year.

Leaker Outlines Potential New Colors for iPhone 18 Pro


Apple's iPhone 18 Pro models could be available in a new rich and warm color option, according to a known leaker.


The Weibo user known as "Instant Digital" has claimed that next-year's ‌iPhone 18‌ Pro models will be available in one of the following color options: coffee, purple, or burgundy. Despite some initial media confusion thinking Apple might release all three of the rumored colors, the leaker later clarified that Apple is currently still in the decision phase will only move forward with production on one of them.

New Version of Siri to 'Lean' on Google Gemini


The new, more powerful version of Siri reportedly coming around March or April of next year will apparently leverage a custom version of Google Gemini as Apple continues to try to catch up to the competition with its own AI capabilities.


Apple will reportedly pay Google in the neighborhood of $1 billion annually for a 1.2-trillion parameter AI model to power Siri.

The Best Early Black Friday Apple Deals


It's already November, which means the holiday shopping season is getting underway ahead of the Black Friday rush later this month.


We're keeping tabs on the best early Black Friday deals on Apple products, while retailers like Best Buy, Target, and Samsung have been sharing their early sales and plans for the rest of the month.

MacRumors Newsletter


Each week, we publish an email newsletter like this highlighting the top Apple stories, making it a great way to get a bite-sized recap of the week hitting all of the major topics we've covered and tying together related stories for a big-picture view.

So if you want to have top stories like the above recap delivered to your email inbox each week, subscribe to our newsletter!
Tag: Top Stories

This article, "Top Stories: iOS 26.1 Released, iOS 26.2 Beta, iPhone 18 Rumors, and More" first appeared on MacRumors.com

Discuss this article in our forums
